org.springframework.osgi.mock
Class MockBundle

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.osgi.mock.MockBundle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bundle
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntryLookupControllingMockBundle
public class MockBundle
extends Object
implements Bundle

Bundle mock. Except resource/class loading operations (which are executed on its internal class loader), the rest of the methods are dummies.

Author:
Costin Leau

setLocation

public void setLocation(String location)
Sets the location for this mock bundle.

Parameters:
location - bundle location

setClassLoader

public void setClassLoader(ClassLoader loader)
Sets the class loader internally used by the bundle to mock the loading operations. By default, the MockBundle uses its own class loader.

Parameters:
loader - mock bundle class loader
